featured.text: For thousands of years, the Chinese have valued highly the soybean, considering it one of the five important grains (along with rice, millet, barley, and wheat).

definition.zh_def: 大麥，一種穀物，常用於製作啤酒和飼料。
definition.en_def: Barley is a cereal grain that is commonly used for brewing beer and as animal feed.
definition.example: Barley is often used to make healthy soups and salads.
